item.title: The fix for Disqus and Images
item.description: Is the cure worse than the disease is what I pondered after I fixed an issue with Disqus comments. I could not figure out how to get the Disqus Comment section to render on this site. The fix for addressing the Disqus issues was changing the baseurl parameter from “/” to the name of the website in the confg.toml file. This Github Issue helped me resolve. item.title: Blogdown lessons
item.description: One big challenge in rendering the site was using the R studio GUI Git. How many times did I restart my computer before I deduced the problem? The Git process would stall out. To solve, I used the new Git desktop feature (https://desktop.github.com/) and it worked.
